channel.title: C|p abuses his powers on mIRC
channel.description:
First of all, I was talking, and all of a sudden I got banned. c|p said
"* You were kicked from #moparscape by ChanServ (BAI (Don't PM the ops you fucking idiot) (c|p))"
-> -c|p- I did not pm an op, The only person I pmed was Zoltanman - * You are not on a channel - -c|p- You are now, and thats what I meant - -c|p- Do not PM any operators asking to be unbanned - -> -c|p- I was asking to be unbanned? I was asking how I was banned. - -> -c|p- I was just seeing that. - -c|p- No, but I know you will soon. Stop PMing me - -> -c|p- How do you know?

item.title: C|p abuses his powers on mIRC
item.dc:creator: @_CopyRight CopyRight
item.description:
@_CopyRight wrote:

Please reveiw this, and remember not to spam/flame.

Read full topic

First of all, I was talking, and all of a sudden I got banned. c|p said

  • You are not on a channel

-c|p- You are now, and thats what I meant

-c|p- Do not PM any operators asking to be unbanned
